about.description:
"PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company's Qt
application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt including
Windows, MacOS/X and Linux. PyQt5 supports Qt v5. PyQt4 supports Qt v4 and
will build against Qt v5. The bindings are implemented as a set of Python
modules and contain over 1,000 classes."
about.summary: Python binding of the cross-platform GUI toolkit Qt.

name: pyqt
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: pyqt
  version: 5.12.3
source:
  - folder: pyqt5
    patches:
      - 0003-configure.patch
      - py2_segfault.diff
      - qt5_dll.diff
    sha1: f442a876794947a24474cf85eb02abd60f00f642
    url: https://distfiles.macports.org/py-pyqt5/PyQt5_gpl-5.12.3.tar.gz
  - folder: sip
    patches:
      - 0001-Do-not-override-CC-CXX-LINK-in-sipgen-Makefile.patch
      - sip-get_config_h_filename.patch
    sha1: d001eb00f6dae26a952770e805b1519f61cae77d
    url: https://distfiles.macports.org/py-sip/sip-4.19.18.tar.gz
  - folder: pyqtwebengine
    sha1: 737acf93ecf39e5e2136e094a8b0a9ffa47bd2de
    url: https://distfiles.macports.org/py-pyqt5/PyQtWebEngine_gpl-5.12.1.tar.gz
  - folder: pyqtcharts
    sha1: 6a876ac37d0ccb5392f67669de5e790c8f9188da
    url: https://github.com/ocefpaf/pyqt-feedstock/releases/download/v5.12.3/PyQtChart_gpl-5.12.tar.gz
build:
  number: 7
  run_exports:
    - pyqt >=5.12.3,<5.13.0a0
  string: py36h704843e_7
requirements:
  host:
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
    - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h4fd8a4c_0
    - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35.1 h02ad14f_2
    - libffi 3.3 h884eca8_2
    - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
    - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
    - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h7a64470_17
    - ncurses 6.2 h7fd3ca4_4
    - openssl 1.1.1k hf897c2e_0
    - python 3.6.13 h468538b_0_cpython
    - readline 8.1 h1a49cc3_0
    - sqlite 3.35.3 h43e6a2a_0
    - tk 8.6.10 ha99a2a3_1
    - xz 5.2.5 h6dd45c4_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1009
  run:
    - pyqt-impl 5.12.3 py36h11bf360_7
    - pyqt5-sip 4.19.18 py36h86e9a40_7
    - pyqtchart 5.12 py36h1b76c54_7
    - pyqtwebengine 5.12.1 py36h1b76c54_7
    - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
    - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
test:
  commands:
    - DISPLAY=localhost:1.0 xvfb-run -a bash -c 'python pyqt_test.py'
    - pyuic5 --version
    - conda list
  files:
    - pyqt_test.py
  imports:
    - PyQt5.QtChart
    - PyQt5.QtCore
    - PyQt5.QtGui
    - PyQt5.QtHelp
    - PyQt5.QtMultimedia
    - PyQt5.QtMultimediaWidgets
    - PyQt5.QtNetwork
    - PyQt5.QtOpenGL
    - PyQt5.QtPrintSupport
    - PyQt5.QtQml
    - PyQt5.QtQuick
    - PyQt5.QtSvg
    - PyQt5.QtTest
    - PyQt5.QtWebChannel
    - PyQt5.QtWebEngine
    - PyQt5.QtWebEngineCore
    - PyQt5.QtWebEngineWidgets
    - PyQt5.QtWebSockets
    - PyQt5.QtWidgets
    - PyQt5.QtXml
    - PyQt5.QtXmlPatterns
    - PyQt5.sip
about:
  description: '"PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company''s
    Qt

    application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt including

    Windows, MacOS/X and Linux. PyQt5 supports Qt v5. PyQt4 supports Qt v4 and

    will build against Qt v5. The bindings are implemented as a set of Python

    modules and contain over 1,000 classes."

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/pyqt
  doc_url: https://www.riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/
  home: http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt
  license: LicenseRef-Commercial or GPL-2.0-only or GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: pyqt5/LICENSE
  summary: Python binding of the cross-platform GUI toolkit Qt.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ccordoba12
    - gillins
    - jschueller
    - mingwandroid
    - msarahan
    - ocefpaf
